intro.head: Welcome!
intro.text: You have made a great decision to sign up with Covexit. We are pleased to guide you through this process.

googleConfirm.head: Business information
googleConfirm.text: Now let's set up your business account! Please fill out the form below. *Please Note: Before you can start selling to customers we need to verify your VAT number. However, In the meantime, you can start adding products and setting up your store.

searchGoogle.head: Name your business
searchGoogle.text: Under which name is your company known? Enter your store name.

manually.head: Business information
manually.text: Now we set up your business account! Please fill out the form below. *Please Note: Before you can start selling to customers we need to verify your VAT number. However, In the meantime, you can start adding products and setting up your store.
